story:
Tyler has been active in martial arts since the age of 4 years old. In 2005 he began aiding in the instruction of judo for the Fountain Police Activities League, and has been doing so since. Accumulating well over 400 hours of community service. At the age of 15 Tyler obtained his 1st degree black belt in Yoshin-ryu jitsu. At the age of 16 he obtained his 1st degree black belt in USA Ju-jitsu and also Traditional Kodokan Judo. As well as instructing judo and jujitsu, Tyler has been an avid competitor throughout the years. He has been a state grappling champion under the Colorado Karate Association (CKA) for three consecutive years in a row (06', 07', 08'). The last year Tyler competed in the CKA (08') he placed second in state in another grappling division. Only due to lack of points for moving up a weight class, by choice not necessity, in the middle of the tournament season. Aside from teaching judo and jujitsu, Tyler is also a Krav Maga instructor for Krav Maga of Southern Colorado. Having obtained his official instructor certification at the beginning of this year. Tyler also volunteers with the Never A Victim Foundation helping teach Krav Maga. Tyler has just recently been promoted to purple belt in Brazilian Jiu-jitsu as well. 

This Campaign will help me (Tyler) gain funding to go compete with the US National Ju-jitsu team in Paris, France. I was selected to join the national team just last month in the hopes that my skills as an athlete and competitor will help aide the US team in becoming a force to be reckoned with on the international stage.

To everyone out there who helps in my campaign you are bringing me a step closer to achieving a goal that has seemed so far away. Not only will you be helping me accomplish my competitive goals, but you will be helping this great nations national Ju-jitsu team.

In order for me to go and compete in Paris I need a total of $3500. This goes towards airfare, lodging, competition fees, a new competition gi and miscellaneous fees (food, parking, etc.)

In return for contributing to my campaign you will receive a pair of Krav Maga hand wraps and for any business's that are interested in contributing a donation of $500 or more will get you your business logo on the uniform that I will be wearing when I do interviews. This competition will be a televised event!


If my funding goal is not met all funds will be used towards obtaining new training equipment (such as mats, gi's, strike pads, focus mitts etc.) for USA Ju-jitsu and Krav Maga of Southern Colorado.

Do not fret if you are unable to contribute financially to my campaign, I appreciate the time you took to look. You can help me though by sharing this campaign! Just use the indiegogo share tools!


Video Filmed and Edited by Hero Plate Studios

story:
About Me and Why I'm Going to Haiti

My name is Bretta.  I'm a newly minted graduate with degrees in biology and public health and a passion for justice and equality in access healthcare around the world.  Fifteen years ago, when I was very young, my family moved to Haiti where my eyes were opened to the burden of poverty and disease suffered by so many around the world.  In the years since I left Haiti, I have studied and volunteered in many places across the globe including the Dominican Republic, Bolivia, Tanzania, Kenya, and Sudan, where I have learned valuable lessons about working with people from different cultures to effect lasting change in community health.  During these experiences, my desire to return to Haiti has only increased so that I can apply what I have learned and make a positive and lasting difference in my old home.  Now, I have the chance that I've been waiting for, and I am asking for your help to make it happen.

 

The Project, and How I Got Involved

This spring, I volunteered in the Portland office of Konbit Sante, a wonderful non-profit organization which has been working in northern Haiti for more than ten years.  A few weeks after I started, my supervisor asked if I would be interested in exploring a six-month supply chain project at a hospital in Haiti.  I hardly even needed to stop and think about it - of course the answer was yes!

So what exactly is supply chain, and why does it matter?  Simply put, the supply chain is the system that gets medicines, supplies, and equipment to the people who need them, and it's important because no hospital can function without it.  Surgeons can't operate without gloves, cholera patients can't be rehydrated without IVs and saline, and tuberculosis can't be treated without appropriate medicine.  The hospital where I will be working has a team of highly skilled nurses and doctors, but because of systemic problems with their supply chain, it is very difficult for them to do their jobs.  Reforming the system to get them the medicines and supplies that they need is the best way to help them save the lives of their patients.

 

Where Your Money Will Go

I am asking for your help to raise $3,455 to cover the cost of my trip.  The line items are as follows:

Roundtrip flight from Boston to Haiti:  $900

Emergency medical evacuation insurance:  $205

Rent:  $2000

In-country transportation: $350

Note:  Any contributions above and beyond my fundraising goal will be given to Konbit Sante to put toward the salaries of the local Haitian staff at the hospital.  If I am unable to raise enough money to make my trip possible, all the funds I raise here will be directed to Konbit Sante's programs in Haiti. 


Tax Deduction Receipts are Available!

Because Konbit Sante is a registered 501(c)3 non-profit organization, your contribution is TAX DEDUCTIBLE.  All you have to do is claim a perk and supply your mailing address, and we will mail a receipt to you at the end of our campaign.  (Note:  If, for any reason, you want a receipt, but do NOT want a perk, just claim the perk and contact me afterward or post a comment.  All recipts will be mailed at the conclusion of the campaign.)

Perks!

If you give any amount you will have the option to sign up for the monthly email newsletter that I will be writing to my friends and supporters, describing my experiences:  the hard work, the low points, the triumphs, and the lessons learned, all in gritty detail.  There will be pictures!

If you give $35 you will recieve a 10 oz bottle of real Caribbean vanilla.  If you have never had Caribbean vanilla, you are in for a treat!  It's extra strong and fragrant, and it makes a great gift.  We have a limited number available, so claim it quickly! (Free shipping in US only.)

If you give $50 you will receive a small piece of Haitian metal art, like the ones displayed below.  These pieces are hand-crafted by Haitan artisans, and you can choose from a range of options.  (Since every piece is slightly different, and our inventory changes, we will contact you with photos of the available options after you claim the perk.  Check out the gallery and updates to see additional examples.  Free shipping only in the US.)

If you give $100 you will receive a mid-sized piece of Haitian metal art like the one pictured below.  (Check out the gallery and updates for more examples.  Free shipping only in the US.)

If you give $150 you will receive a large piece of Haitian metal art like the one pictured below.  (Check out the gallery and updates for more examples.  Free shipping only in the US.)

If you give $300 you will get to select a large piece of metal art, plus I will personally select a bonus gift for you in Haiti and ship it to you upon my return.  I don't know what it is yet, but it'll be AWESOME! (Free shipping in US only.)

All perks will be shipped at the conclusion of the campaign.  If your perk is a piece of metal art, we will contact you with photographs to choose from on or around Sept 5th, and then ship your selection. 

Other Ways to Help

Broke?  I can sympathize. It's a tough economy, and I know not everybody can give.  If you like my campaign and want to show support, you can help by:

- Commenting

- Sharing my campaign with your friends

- Giving a nominal amount (like $1)

All of these can help me by raising my gogofactor and making my campaign more visible on the website.  I'm very grateful for anything you can do to help!

 

More About Konbit Sante

In Haitian Creole, a konbit is a traditional Haitian method of working together to till your friends' fields as well as your own.  Sante means health.  So the name means "working together for health."  Konbit Sante's mission is to support the development of a sustainable health care system to meet the needs of the Haitian community with maximum local direction and support.  KS has worked in the Cap-Haitien area of Haiti for more than ten years and supports the local health system through:

-Clinical work

-Children's health programs

-Infrastructure projects

-Supply chain support

-Crisis response

After the 2010 earthquake, Konbit Sante took immediate action and helped to meet the needs of earthquake victims by providing transport from Port-au-Prince to the Cap-Haitien hospital, paying the costs of treatment, purchasing and transporting medical supplies from the Dominican Republic, and supporting efforts to distribute food, water and sanitary items in camps in the Port-au-Prince area.

Konbit Sante has also worked tirelessly to meet the challenges of the cholera epidemic which began shortly after the earthquake and spread like wildfire due to the lack of a sanitation system and clean drinking water.  Victims of cholera are exposed through contaminated drinking water, may show symptoms within 3-5 hours of exposure, and often die due to rapid dehydration.  The Cap-Haitian area has been hit very hard by the epidemic, and KS has responded both by expanding access to clean drinking water and by helping to set up treatment support centers where cholera victims can be saved through aggressive rehydration therapy.

For more info about Konbit Sante, please visit the website: www.healthyhaiti.org

story:
Short Summary

The Play Nexus is raising funds to bring you a day of truly loving fun led by two master players: Natalie Kinsey and Bernie DeKoven.

Natalie is one of the prime movers (and we mean “mover”) of the Play Nexus. Bernie is the author of Recess for the Soul, The Well-Played Game, the newly released A Playful Path and the website Deepfun.com.

We want to bring these two people together with you, so we can join forces to bring a whole new level of play to each other, and the world.

This will be a first: the first time Natalie and Bernie will be combining their deeply playful understanding and love to bring something new into the world - a new synthesis between what Natalie has been calling “conscious play” and Bernie “a playful path.”

We’re calling it “The Day of the Playful Heart” because we are planning to go that deep and be that profoundly playful.

The Day of the Playful Heart: a day devoted to people playing, lovingly with their tribes, their lovers, children and with the world. Exploring and experimenting with a lighter, more flexible, and more collaborative framework than many of the self help tools like yoga and meditation, while encompassing all of those things.  It’s a go anywhere “mo bettah” tool, infinitely adaptable and infinitely trueing.  

Helping each other play mo better is helping the world to Be mo better.

http://future.playnexus.com/index.html

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need 2500 to fund the entire trip and the day of loving play.  We have some missions to run and need marketing and supplies and to hire runners to bring the play to the people and to create the archival video after, which will inspire a whole 'nother year of deeply loving play.
  • We have some rare items (some of which are already worth over $1000 bucks and only increasing in value as collectors items!) as well 10 Play Fuel Ups with Natalie that are consistently described as "nothing short of miraculous."

The Impact

Conscious Play is the new black.  It is a go anywhere tool that allows a wider swath of people be more consciously loving about how they interactive with the world.  It works for anyone because everyone, at their core, longs to be more playful.  Learning how to play more authentically is at the core of all desires.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our work!  Play with your life!  

http://future.playnexus.com/index.html

story:
Go down to English version.




Unsere Idee

Viele Menschen im Ausland würden gerne Waren bei deutschen Händlern bestellen und können das auch. Aber viele Händler liefern ausschließlich im Inland. Die gleiche Erfahrung machen auch viele Deutsche, die sich zum Beispiel als Arbeitnehmer, Rentner, Studenten oder Soldaten dauerhaft im Ausland befinden. Sie kommen außerdem nicht mehr ohne Weiteres an ihre Post.

Mit unserer Idee schaffen wir es ganz einfach diese Hürde zu überwinden: All unsere Kunden erhalten bei uns einen Lagerplatz und dazu eine deutsche Lieferadresse, an die sie Pakete, Briefe und Zeitschriften zu Inlandskonditionen liefern lassen können. Einmal hier angekommen kann dann jeder in seinem Kundenaccount bestimmen, wann seine Sendungen an seine Heimatadresse geschickt werden sollen und ob das einzeln passiert oder mehrere in ein großes Paket umgepackt werden sollen. Die gewünschten Waren oder die eigene Post sind dann nur noch einen Zwischenschritt weit entfernt.

 

Und die Möglichkeiten sind sogar noch vielfältiger: Wir können Briefpost auch scannen und praktisch ohne Zeitverzögerung elektronisch zur Verfügung stellen. Das ist ideal für alle, die sich beim Work and Travel treiben lassen oder zwischen verschiedenen Standorten im Ausland pendeln müssen. Flexible und breit gefächerte Tarifoptionen ermöglichen es dabei jedem eine maßgeschneiderte Mailbox für seine ganz individuellen Bedürfnisse zu gestalten.

Garantiert finden unsere Kunden überall auf dem Globus noch andere Wege Mailbox Germany zu nutzen. Doch damit es losgehen kann, brauchen wir erst mal noch deine Hilfe.


Was ist besonders an dieser Idee?

  • Kunden aus dem Ausland können mit Mailbox Germany bei Händlern Kaufen, die keinen Versand ins Ausland bieten. (z.B. bei Otto, Tchibo oder SportScheck)
  • Preisvorteile, durch preiswerte Versandtarife und juristische Absicherungen für Kunden und Händler, da deutsche Gesetzesvorgaben für den Einkauf gelten.
  • Eine deutsche Lieferadresse für Pakete, Briefe und Zeitschriften mit Dienstleistungen wie:
  1. Zwischenlagern und Konsolidieren - Bestellungen in ein Paket zusammenfassen und sparen!
  2. Annahme und Weiterleitung ins Ausland - Wir senden dir dein Paket in jedes Land!
  3. Digitalisieren von Drucksachen - mach deine analoge Post digital und durchsuchbar!
  • transparente Preis- und Leistungspolitik - einfache Tarifübersicht
  • schnelle und einfache Kalkulation der Versandpreise durch unseren Versandkalkulator
  • Online-Warenprüfung anhand automatisch generierter Bildern bei Wareneingang
  • alle Services über die Onlineplattform bestellen und verwalten


Unsere Leistungen im Kurzüberblick:

Zusätzlich bieten wir:

  • Retourenservice (bei Nichtgefallen einer Shop-Bestellung)
  • Onlinemanagement von deinen Sendungen und Dokumenten
  • Zoll-Erklärung online ausfüllen
  • mehrere Tarifoptionen (Free, Private, Professional)
  • Multilinguale Homepage (deutsch, französisch, englisch)
  • individuelle Adressstruktur ohne unseren Firmennamen
  • Versand innerhalb Deutschlands
  • nachhaltige Umweltphilosophie - die Verpackung ist biologisch abbaubar und der Versand optional CO2 neutral

Standortvorteile nutzen

Unser Unternehmen ist in Merseburg (Sachsen-Anhalt) angesiedelt und damit sehr nah am internationalen DHL Luftfrachtzentrum in Leipzig und in der Nähe von vielen Paketdepots (UPS, TNT, DPD, Hermes, GLS) in Mitteldeutschland. 


Nicht alle Fragen beantwortet?

In unserer FAQ (Fragen und Antworten) findest du eine umfangreiche Sammlung von Fragen und Antworten zum den Themen: Zoll und Gesetzen, fehlerhafte Lieferungen, Retouren etc.

Unter Preise und Leistungen findest du weitere Informationen zu unseren Leistungen.


Cross-border Shopping -
Drei Beispiele für unsere Idee

Mailbox Germany bringt Mini ins BWM-Museum

Was macht man in einem fremden Land wenn das eigene Auto kaputt geht? Paul, einem Freund ist genau das in Brasilien passiert. Unterwegs auf einer Reise durch Lateinamerika hatte er seinen BMW Mini von Streetart-Künstlern gestalten lassen. Dann brach ihm nach 20.000 Kilometern die Kupplung.

In einer Werkstatt sagte man ihm, die Kupplung koste 2.000$ und die Lieferzeit sei ungewiss. Darauf wollte sich Paul nicht einlassen. Aber sein Auto zurückzulassen kam für ihn nicht in Frage. Glücklicherweise gab es Rettung. In einem deutschen Online Shop hatte er eine Kupplung für 185€ gefunden, doch der Händler wollte nicht außerhalb Deutschlands liefern. So rief er bei uns an und fragte ob wir die Kupplung für ihn entgegennehmen und nach Brasilien schicken.

Logo, antworteten wir.Denn mit unserem Onlinehandel Vireo.de verfügen wir über das Know How international zu versenden. So sparte Paul eine Menge Geld und Zeit. Und der Mini - steht heute als Kunstobjekt im BMW Museum in München. Und aus der Idee "Sendungen weiterzuleiten" entstand unsere Start-Up-Idee. 

Wie grenzenloser Versand Leben retten kann

Immer wieder erschüttern Produktskandale das Vertrauen der Kunden in unterschiedlichen Regionen der Welt. Dies weckt bei den betroffenen oft den Wunsch nach einer alternativen Bezugsquelle. 2008 erschütterte China ein Bericht über verbotene Chemikalien im Milchpulver. Sechs Babys starben und mindestens 300.000 Kleinkinder kamen mit Nierensteinen ins Krankenhaus. Seitdem decken viele Chinesen unter anderem mit deutsche Milchpulver ihren Bedarf. Austauschstudenten und Touristen versorgen die Bekannten und Freunde im Heimatland. Doch auch Chinesen die keine Bekannten oder Freunde in Europa haben würden gerne in Deutschland bestellen. Doch die Hersteller reagieren mit einer Regulierung des Versands.

Mit Mailbox Germany möchten wir daher einen Service aufbauen der es Ausländern ermöglicht Bestellungen zu tätigen als wären sie in Deutschland. Denn Kunden sind mittlerweile global auf der Suche wenn heimische Anbieter nicht bereit sind auf ihre Bedürfnisse einzugehen.

Warum kompliziert, wenn es auch einfach geht?

Im Geschäftsleben kommt es häufig vor, dass man mehr mitnehmen will als man im Flugzeug Reisegepäck haben darf. Also verschickt man den Rest per Paket an den Zielort.

Ganz einfach? 

Der Teufel steckt im Detail: Will man die Ware unbesehen zum Kunden schicken? Nimmt das Hotel das Paket richtig entgegen? Wann muss das Paket abgegeben werden damit es rechtzeitig da ist? Muss ich für einfache Sendungen gleich in Verhandlung mit Logistikkonzernen gehen?

Ein Unternehmer meinte im Gespräch er wünsche sich eine Firma, die ihm seine Sendung für ein paar Tage einlagert. Er würde dann voraus fliegen und die Ware im Hotel persönlich entgegennehmen.

Prima, meinten wir, denn mit Mailbox Germany bieten wir einen Weiterleitungsservice der Pakete und Briefe in Deutschland annimmt und von dort in alle Welt verschickt. Wann und wohin die Sendung geschickt werden soll können unsere Kunden einfach und transparent, online entscheiden. Wir erledigen die Zollerklärung und suchen den besten Transporttarif für sie. Auf unserer Webseite können eingeloggte Kunden dann Warensendungen beauftragen und werden über Kosten und Versanddauer informiert. Mit unserem Tracking-Tool können sie die Sendung auch gleich auf unserer Webseite verfolgen.

Schweizer kaufen vor dem Release das iPhone 5 in Deutschland

Keine Liefertermin? Keine Lust auf Schlange stehen? Mit diesen Fragen waren die Schweizer beschäftigt, wenn Sie vor dem Releasetermin in der Schweiz das iPhone 5 in den Händen halten wollten. Dabei war die Antwort so einfach - das iPhone 5S und 5C einfach online in Deutschland bestellen! Hier geht es zu dem interessanten Artikel: iPhone 5S und 5C: Wie Schweizer es vorher kaufen.


Mit einer deutschen Lieferadresse unkompliziert und schnell zu realisieren - Mailbox Germany macht es möglich!


An dieser Stelle kommst du ins Spiel

Du kannst uns mit einem finanziellen Beitrag dabei unterstützen die letzten Schritte bei einem Projekt zu gehen, in das wir schon so viel Arbeit und Herzblut investiert haben und in das wir große Hoffnungen setzen. Mit deinem Beitrag wollen wir die professionelle Programmierung unserer Plattform umsetzen, inklusive der aufwendigen Implementierung des Shipping Calculators. Aus dem Gewinn unseres bestehenden Onlinestores Vireo.de können wir leider unseren Kapitalbedarf noch nicht vollständig decken und benötigen daher immer noch 20.000€, um unseren Service zu starten.

Das Beste zum Schluss

Natürlich wollen wir dir für deine Unterstützung auch etwas zurückgeben! Neben ganz realem Dank und virtuellen Blumen und Konfekt, gibt es jede Menge handfester Gegenleistungen: Von einem Jahresabo für eine Mailbox zum Verschenken oder selber nutzen, über ein flexibles Solarpanel (lass die Sonne nicht nur in dein Herz, sondern auch in deine Hardware) bis hin zu einem zweitägigen Aufenthalt in Merseburg mit uns warten allerhand Gimmicks für deine Hilfe auf dich. Und du kommst an unsere Wall of Fame – natürlich nur wenn du willst.

Als Dankeschön erhälst Du eine nützliche Solar-Taschenlampe. Der perfekte Begleiter für Reisen oder für das Auto.


Du kannst über den verbauten Dynamo oder das Solar Panel die Lampe laden.

So bist Du nie auf Batterien angewiesen!:)

(Abb. ähnlich)

Mailbox Package - 75€

Meet and Greet - 99€

Wir führen dich und zwei deiner Freunde durch unser Unternehmen. Danach gibt es einen kleinen Snack und wir spielen ein Tischkickerturnier gegen euch. Zusätzlich gibt es eine kleine Überraschung. 

Big Sunshine Package - 135€

Du willst mehr für die Umwelt tun, als nur deine Pakete CO2-neutral ins Ausland weiterleiten zu lassen? Dann lade deine Geräte mit einem großen flexiblen Solarpanel ( USB, 12W) im Wert von über 150€ aus unserem Versandhandel Vireo.de. 

Professional Mailbox Package - 250€

1 Jahr den Tarif Professional kostenlos und keine Kosten auf unsere Servicegebühren im Wert von 100€. Zusätzlich bekommst du ein Überraschungspaket mit typischen regionalen Produkten aus Deutschland.

The Special One - 500€

Wir laden Dich (+1) für 2 Tage nach Merseburg ein. Du wohnst in einem wunderschönen Anwesen nähe des Merseburger Schlosses (Drehort von The Monuments Men). Darüber hinaus laden wir Dich zu einem saisonalem Kultur-Event und einer Führung durch unser Unternehmen ein.


Fragen und Antworten:

Warum lasse ich mir die Ware nicht vom Onlineshop direkt ins Ausland schicken?

50% der Onlineshops in Deutschland versenden nicht aktiv ins Ausland, so kann es passieren, dass du wichtige Waren nicht bekommst.

Welche Sparte nutzt Mailbox Germany?

Mailbox Germany agiert im Small Parcel Bereich bis 40kg. Darüber hinaus agieren internationale Logistikfirmen und Speditionen.

Versendet ihr die Waren selbst?

Nein, wir versenden ausschließlich mit etablierten, internationalen Dienstleistern, wie DHL, DPD oder UPS.

Müsst ihr meine Pakete kontrollieren?

Um die Ausfuhr beim Zollamt anzumelden müssen wir gegebenenfalls in dein Paket schauen. Den Inhalt von Briefen lassen wir jedoch unangetastet.

Wie verwalte ich meine Briefe und Pakete?

Das Onlinemanagement ist der Schlüssel. Unser Login-Bereich macht es dir möglich unsere vielen verschiedenen Services zu buchen und deine Sendungen einfach zu verwalten. Durch dieses elektronische System können wir dir im Vergleich zu Logistikfirmen gute und günstige Preise bieten.

Seid ihr ein zugelassener Postdienst? 

Wir haben bereits eine Postlizenz und dürfen damit deine Post und Pakete offiziell befördern. 

Wie kann ich Mailbox Germany als zweiten Briefkasten nutzen?

Du kannst über den Nachsendeservice der deutschen Post deinen Briefkasten praktisch zu uns umziehen lassen.

Euer Mailbox-Germany-Team



English version



Our idea 

Many people abroad like to order goods from Germany and actually can do that. But most of the traders deliver only domestically. The same thing is experienced by lot of Germans, who are permanently located abroad, for example, expatriates, pensioners or soldiers. Moreover, they can not automatically collect their mail.

Our idea is to overcome this obstacle quite easy: each of our customers gets some storage place and a German delivery address, where they can send packages, letters and magazines at the domestic rates. Everyone can check their account, see when the package has been received here and choose whether to forward it directly to his home or to combine several shipments into a bigger one. Then, the desired goods or mails are only one step away. 

 

But there are even more possibilities: we can also scan the mail and provide it online with no time delays. This is perfect for people, who move between different locations due to their work or traveling. Flexible and diversified tariff options allow everyone to customize the mailbox for his individual needs.

In order to be ready to go, we still need your help.


What is special about this idea?

  • Customers from abroad can buy at German online retailers that do not offer international shipping (e.g. Otto, Tchibo or SportScheck)
  • Price advantages through low shipping costs and legal safeguard for customers and retailers are ensured since German country-specific legal requirements apply 
  • A German shipping address for packages, letters and magazines including the following services:

    1. Temporary storage and consolidation- Put several orders into one package and save money!

    2. Reception and forwarding abroad. We send you your package to any country!

    3. Digitization of printed matter- digitalize your mail for easier management!
    • Transparency of cost and performance- easy tariff overview
    • Simple and quick calculation ofshipping prices calculated via our shipping calculator
    • Online item check by reference to automatic generated pictures at receipt of goods
    • Manage all services directly from our online platform


    Our services at a glance:

    • Reception and storage of packages, letters and magazines/newspapers
    • Forwarding of packages (separately or consolidated)
    • (Automatic) forwarding of letters (separately or consolidated)

    • (Automatic) digitization of letters, documents and other printed material

    • We also forward official correspondence to you

    In addition we offer:

    • Return service (in case your purchased items do not meet  your expectations)
    • Online management of your packages and documents
    • Complete your customs declaration online
    • Several tariff options (Free, Private, Professional)
    • A multilingual website (German, English, French)
    • Individual delivery address (leaving out the designation Mailbox Germany)
    • individuelle Adressstruktur ohne unseren Firmennamen
    • Shipping within Germany
    • Sustainability Philosophy- packaging is biodegradable and optional carbon neutral shipping available

    Use locational advantages

    Our company is located in Merseburg (Saxony-Anhalt), very close to the DHL World Cargo Center in Leipzig as well as to other depot locations (UPS, TNT, DPD, Hermes, GLS) in Central Germany.  

    You still have questions?

    In our FAQ section you find a comprehensive summary of questions and answers to the following subjects:

    Customs and regulations, faulty deliveries, returns, etc.

    To find out more about our services go to Prices and Services.


    Cross-border shopping - 
    Three example, how we came up with our idea

    Mailbox Germany takes Mini Cooper to BWM-Museum

    What exactly do you do when your car breaks down in a foreign country? Exactly this happened to my friend Paul in Brazil. On his journey throughout South America he had his Mini Cooper designed by street artists. After about 12.000 miles his clutch broke.

    At the dealership he was told that repair costs would amount to $2.000 and that the delivery period would be uncertain. Paul would not let himself get into this. But leaving his car behind was out of the question. Fortunately, help was at hand. By searching the internet, he found a clutch for €185 on a website of a German online shop. But the trader was not willing to deliver outside Germany. That is when Paul called us to ask if we could take delivery of his clutch and send it to Brazil.

    Absolutely! Thanks to our online shop Vireo.de we have aquired practical knowledge concerning international shipping. Paul was able to save a great amount of money and time. And the Mini- is today an object of art and part of the permanent exhibition in the BMW Museum in Munich. This is one of the events that brought up the startup idea of delivery forwarding. 

    How shipping across borders can save lives 

    All around the world product scandals shatter consumer trust again and again. People concerned often wish having the choice of an alternative supplier. In 2008 people in China were terrified by the news and events of prohibited chemicals that were found in powdered milk.  Six babies died and at least 300.000 small children with kidney stones had to be treated in hospitals. Ever since, many Chinese stock up on German powdered milk among other things. Exchange students and tourists supply their family and friends back home. But those who do not have relatives or friends in Europe would also like to buy in Germany. However, manufacturers react with shipping regulations. 

    With Mailbox Germany we intend to set up a service that offers people residing outside Germany the opportunity to buy and order products as if they were living here. Today, people are searching globally for products that their domestic market does not provide.

    In business it often happens that one would like to take more baggage along than actually authorized by the airlines. Consequently, the rest is being shipped in a package to its destination. 

    Is it really that easy? 

    The devil is in the detail: Should one really ship goods without prior inspection to the customer? Will the hotel accept the delivery properly? When does the package have to be delivered in order to arrive in time? Do I immediately have to enter into negotiations with haulage companies for a simple shipment? 

    There was a businessman who expressed the wish that there was a company that could stock his delivery for a few days until he gets to the hotel to receive the goods personally.

    Great! That was our first thought since with Mailbox Germany we provide a forwarding service thanks to which we will receive packages and letters in Germany and send them across the globe. When and where you want your items to be shipped lies exclusively in your hands. Our customers can control all processes easily and transparently online. We deal with the customs declaration and find the best transport tariff for you. On our website customers can log into their user account to request shipping of their goods and will be informed about delivery charges and delivery time. Using the tracking tool on our website you can check on the delivery status of your items at any time.

    Swiss people purchase iPhone 5 before release date

    No delivery date for the iPhone 5 in Switzerland! This issue experienced a lot of swiss Apple fans.
    The answer was very simple - order the iPhone 5S and 5C simply online in Germany!
    Click here for this interesting article: iPhone 5S and 5C: How Swiss buy iphone in advance.


    With an address in Germany your order is done quickly and easily enough  - Mailbox Germany makes it possible! 


    Our perks

    Thank You Email - 5€

    We thank you for your support with a personal Email. 

    Thank You Picture - 10€

     Thank You team picture just for you!

    Individual Postcard - 15€

    We will send you a Thank You, very classic with a individual postcard including a beautiful picture of Merseburg - worldwide!

    Light it up - 15€

    You'll get this useful solar-flashlight. The perfect companion for traveling and or for your car. 

    You can charge the lamp through the built in Dynamo or the solar panel.

    So you're never dependent from batteries! For international orders pls add 5€ extra for shipping costs.

    A little present for you - 19€

    We will send you for free a little Thank-you gift out of our shop www.vireo.de For international orders pls add 5€ extra for shipping costs.

    Wall of Fame - 29€

    Your name will get a spot on our Wall of Fame. As a proof we will send you a picture of this!

    Small Mailbox Package - 39€

    You get one year our subscription "Private" for free plus 10€ on your first forwarded shipment.

    Sunshine Package - 59€

    (similar to figure)

    you think our Idea is great, but you dont need it yourself? But maybe a small, flexible and environmentally friendly solar panel (USB, 3W with battery), with which you can charge mobile devices (camera, mobile) on the go. International shipping: +8€

    Mailbox Package - 75€

    You will get our subscription "Professional" plus a Postcard from Merseburg / Germany.  

    Meet and Greet - 99€

    We will guide you and two friends of your choice through our company. Afterwards you get a small snack and we play a foosball tournament together. In addition, we have a little surprise for you. 

    Big Sunshine Package - 135€

    You want to do more for the environment than to forward your packages carbon neutral? Then charge your devices with a large, flexible solar panel (USB, 12W) worth over 150 € from our mail order store Vireo.de.

    Professional Mailbox Package - 250€

    You'll get our subscription Professional for one year for free and a credit on out service fees worth 100€. Additionally you will get a surprise package with typical german Products.

    The Special One - 500€

    We invite you (+1) for 2 days to Merseburg. You live in a beautiful mansion near the Merseburg Castle (location of The Monuments Men). In addition, we invite you to a seasonal cultural event and a guided tour through our company.


    FAQ

    Why do they not send my packages directly abroad? 50% of online shops in Germany do not actively send abroad, therefore it may happen that you do not get important goods. 

    Which area does Mailbox Germany operate in? Germany acts in the Small Parcel Area up to 40kg. For shipments bigger than that other international logistics companies and freight forwarders are better suited. 

    Do you ship the goods by yourself? No, we ship only with established, international service providers, such as DHL, DPD or UPS. 

    Are you going to check my package? If it will be necessary,  we will check the content of the package in order to have it registered at the custom office. However, the letters are not going to be controlled. 

    How can I manage my mail and packages? The online management is the key. Through an online account it is possible to select from a range of our services and easily manage your shipments. So we can offer you the friendly prices in comparison to services of logistic companies. 

    Are you a licensed postal service?
    Yes, we have a postal licence. Therefore, we can officially carry your mail and packages. 

    How can I use Mailbox Germany as my second mailbox? You can redirect your mailings to our address using the redirection service of Deutsche Post.

Unsere IdeeViele
 Menschen im Ausland würden gerne Waren bei deutschen Händlern bestellen
 und können das auch. Aber viele Händler liefern ausschließlich im 
Inland. Die gleiche Erfahrung machen auch viele Deutsche, die sich zum 
Beispiel als Arbeitnehmer, Rentner, Studenten oder Soldaten dauerhaft im
 Ausland befinden. Sie kommen außerdem nicht mehr ohne Weiteres an ihre 
Post.  
 
Mit
 unserer Idee schaffen wir es ganz einfach diese Hürde zu überwinden: 
All unsere Kunden erhalten bei uns einen Lagerplatz und dazu eine deutsche Lieferadresse,
 an die sie Pakete, Briefe und Zeitschriften zu Inlandskonditionen 
liefern lassen können. Einmal hier angekommen kann dann jeder in seinem 
Kundenaccount bestimmen, wann seine Sendungen an seine Heimatadresse 
geschickt werden sollen und ob das einzeln passiert oder mehrere in ein 
großes Paket umgepackt werden sollen. Die gewünschten Waren oder die 
eigene Post sind dann nur noch einen Zwischenschritt weit entfernt.

  Und
 die Möglichkeiten sind sogar noch vielfältiger: Wir können 
Briefpost auch scannen und praktisch ohne Zeitverzögerung elektronisch 
zur Verfügung stellen. Das ist ideal für alle, die sich beim Work and 
Travel treiben lassen oder zwischen verschiedenen Standorten im Ausland 
pendeln müssen. Flexible und breit gefächerte Tarifoptionen ermöglichen 
es dabei jedem eine maßgeschneiderte Mailbox für seine ganz 
individuellen Bedürfnisse zu gestalten. 

 
Garantiert
 finden unsere Kunden überall auf dem Globus noch andere Wege Mailbox 
Germany zu nutzen. Doch damit es losgehen kann, brauchen wir erst mal 
noch deine Hilfe.Was ist besonders an dieser Idee?
Kunden aus dem Ausland können mit Mailbox Germany bei Händlern Kaufen, die keinen Versand ins Ausland bieten. (z.B. bei Otto, Tchibo oder SportScheck)

Preisvorteile, durch preiswerte Versandtarife und juristische Absicherungen für Kunden und Händler, da deutsche Gesetzesvorgaben für den Einkauf gelten.

Eine deutsche Lieferadresse für Pakete, Briefe und Zeitschriften mit Dienstleistungen wie:


Zwischenlagern und Konsolidieren - Bestellungen in ein Paket zusammenfassen und sparen!

Annahme und Weiterleitung ins Ausland - Wir senden dir dein Paket in jedes Land!

Digitalisieren von Drucksachen - mach deine analoge Post digital und durchsuchbar!


transparente Preis- und Leistungspolitik - einfache Tarifübersicht

schnelle und einfache Kalkulation der Versandpreise durch unseren Versandkalkulator

Online-Warenprüfung anhand automatisch generierter Bildern bei Wareneingang

alle Services über die Onlineplattform bestellen und verwalten
Unsere Leistungen im Kurzüberblick:Zusätzlich bieten wir:
Retourenservice (bei Nichtgefallen einer Shop-Bestellung)
Onlinemanagement von deinen Sendungen und Dokumenten
Zoll-Erklärung online ausfüllen
mehrere Tarifoptionen (Free, Private, Professional)
Multilinguale Homepage (deutsch, französisch, englisch)
individuelle Adressstruktur ohne unseren Firmennamen
Versand innerhalb Deutschlands
nachhaltige Umweltphilosophie - die Verpackung ist biologisch abbaubar und der Versand optional CO2 neutral
Standortvorteile nutzen
Unser Unternehmen ist in Merseburg (Sachsen-Anhalt)
angesiedelt und damit sehr nah am internationalen DHL Luftfrachtzentrum in Leipzig und in der Nähe von vielen Paketdepots (UPS, TNT, DPD, Hermes, GLS) in Mitteldeutschland. Nicht alle Fragen beantwortet?In unserer FAQ
 (Fragen und Antworten) findest du eine umfangreiche Sammlung von Fragen
 und Antworten zum den Themen: Zoll und Gesetzen, fehlerhafte 
Lieferungen, Retouren etc.Unter Preise und Leistungen findest du weitere Informationen zu unseren Leistungen.Cross-border Shopping - Drei Beispiele für unsere IdeeMailbox Germany bringt Mini ins BWM-MuseumWas macht
man in einem fremden Land wenn das eigene Auto kaputt geht? Paul,
einem Freund ist genau das in Brasilien passiert.
Unterwegs auf einer Reise durch Lateinamerika hatte er seinen BMW
Mini von Streetart-Künstlern gestalten lassen. Dann brach ihm nach
20.000 Kilometern die Kupplung.
In einer
Werkstatt sagte man ihm, die Kupplung koste 2.000$ und die Lieferzeit
sei ungewiss. Darauf wollte sich Paul nicht einlassen. Aber sein Auto
zurückzulassen kam für ihn nicht in Frage. Glücklicherweise gab es
Rettung. In einem deutschen Online Shop hatte er eine Kupplung für
185€ gefunden, doch der Händler wollte nicht außerhalb
Deutschlands liefern. So rief er bei uns an und fragte ob wir die
Kupplung für ihn entgegennehmen und nach Brasilien schicken.Logo,
antworteten wir.Denn mit unserem Onlinehandel Vireo.de verfügen wir über das Know How international zu versenden. So
 sparte Paul eine Menge Geld und Zeit. Und der Mini - steht heute als 
Kunstobjekt im BMW Museum in München. Und aus der Idee "Sendungen 
weiterzuleiten" entstand unsere Start-Up-Idee. Wie grenzenloser Versand Leben retten kann
Immer wieder erschüttern Produktskandale das Vertrauen der Kunden
in unterschiedlichen Regionen der Welt. Dies weckt bei den
betroffenen oft den Wunsch nach einer alternativen Bezugsquelle. 2008
erschütterte China ein Bericht über verbotene Chemikalien im
Milchpulver. Sechs Babys starben und mindestens 300.000 Kleinkinder
kamen mit Nierensteinen ins Krankenhaus. Seitdem decken viele
Chinesen unter anderem mit deutsche Milchpulver ihren Bedarf.
Austauschstudenten und Touristen versorgen die Bekannten und Freunde
im Heimatland. Doch auch Chinesen die keine Bekannten oder Freunde in
Europa haben würden gerne in Deutschland bestellen. Doch die
Hersteller reagieren mit einer Regulierung des Versands.
Mit Mailbox Germany möchten wir daher einen Service aufbauen der es
Ausländern ermöglicht Bestellungen zu tätigen als wären sie in
Deutschland. Denn Kunden sind mittlerweile global auf der Suche wenn
heimische Anbieter nicht bereit sind auf ihre Bedürfnisse
einzugehen.Warum kompliziert, wenn es auch einfach geht?
Im Geschäftsleben kommt es häufig vor, dass man mehr mitnehmen
will als man im Flugzeug Reisegepäck haben darf. Also verschickt man
den Rest per Paket an den Zielort.

Ganz einfach? 

Der Teufel steckt im Detail: Will man die Ware unbesehen zum Kunden
schicken? Nimmt das Hotel das Paket richtig entgegen? Wann muss das
Paket abgegeben werden damit es rechtzeitig da ist? Muss ich für
einfache Sendungen gleich in Verhandlung mit Logistikkonzernen gehen?

Ein Unternehmer meinte im Gespräch er wünsche sich eine Firma, die
ihm seine Sendung für ein paar Tage einlagert. Er würde dann voraus
fliegen und die Ware im Hotel persönlich entgegennehmen.

Prima, meinten wir, denn mit Mailbox Germany bieten wir einen
Weiterleitungsservice der Pakete und Briefe in Deutschland annimmt
und von dort in alle Welt verschickt. Wann und wohin die Sendung
geschickt werden soll können unsere Kunden einfach und transparent,
online entscheiden. Wir erledigen die Zollerklärung und suchen den
besten Transporttarif für sie. Auf unserer Webseite können
eingeloggte Kunden dann Warensendungen beauftragen und werden über
Kosten und Versanddauer informiert. Mit unserem Tracking-Tool können
sie die Sendung auch gleich auf unserer Webseite verfolgen.Schweizer kaufen vor dem Release das iPhone 5 in DeutschlandKeine

 das iPhone 5 in den Händen halten wollten. Dabei war die Antwort so 
einfach - das iPhone 5S und 5C einfach online in Deutschland bestellen!

Hilfe auf dich. Und du kommst an unsere Wall of Fame – natürlich nur 
wenn du willst.  

 Unsere GegenleistungenThank You Email - 5€
Wir bedanken uns bei Dir mit einer persönlichen Email. Thank You Picture - 10€
Wir sagen Danke mit einem persönlichen Team Bild nur für Dich!Individual Postcard - 15€

ganz klassisch mit einer individuellen Postkarte mit einem wunderschönen
 Motiv aus Merseburg - weltweit!Light it up - 15€Als Dankeschön erhälst Du eine nützliche Solar-Taschenlampe. Der perfekte Begleiter für Reisen oder für das Auto.Du kannst über den verbauten Dynamo oder das Solar Panel die Lampe laden.So bist Du nie auf Batterien angewiesen!:)A little present for you - 19€
Wir senden Dir kostenlos ein kleines Dankeschön aus unserem Shop Vireo.de

Für den Versand außerhalb Deutschlands bitte +5€ hinzufügen.Wall of Fame - 29€

(Abb. ähnlich)Unsere Idee findest du stark, 
brauchst sie selbst aber nicht? Dann gibt es für dich ein kleines, 
flexibles Solarpanel ( USB, 3W mit Akku) im Wert von über 60€, mit dem 
du mobilen Geräte (Kamera, Handy etc) ganz einfach unterwegs aufladen 
kannstMailbox Package - 75€
Du bekommst unseren Tarif Professional für 1 Jahr kostenlos und eine Postkarte aus Merseburg!  Meet and Greet - 99€
Wir führen dich und zwei deiner 
Freunde durch unser Unternehmen. Danach gibt es einen kleinen Snack und 
wir spielen ein Tischkickerturnier gegen euch. Zusätzlich gibt es eine 
kleine Überraschung. Big Sunshine Package - 135€
Du willst mehr für die Umwelt tun,
 als nur deine Pakete CO2-neutral ins Ausland weiterleiten zu lassen?

 im Wert von über 150€ aus unserem Versandhandel Vireo.de. Professional Mailbox Package - 250€

kostenlos und keine Kosten auf unsere Servicegebühren im Wert von 100€. 
Zusätzlich bekommst du ein Überraschungspaket mit typischen regionalen 
Produkten aus Deutschland.The Special One - 500€
Wir laden Dich (+1) für 2 Tage 
nach Merseburg ein. Du wohnst in einem wunderschönen Anwesen nähe des  
Merseburger Schlosses (Drehort von The Monuments Men). Darüber hinaus 
laden wir Dich zu einem saisonalem Kultur-Event und einer Führung durch 
unser Unternehmen ein.Fragen und Antworten:
Warum lasse ich mir die Ware nicht vom Onlineshop direkt ins Ausland
schicken? 
50% der Onlineshops in Deutschland versenden nicht aktiv ins Ausland, so
kann es passieren, dass du wichtige Waren nicht bekommst. 
Welche Sparte nutzt Mailbox Germany? 
Mailbox Germany agiert im Small Parcel Bereich bis 40kg. Darüber hinaus
agieren internationale Logistikfirmen und Speditionen. 
Versendet ihr die Waren selbst? 
Nein, wir versenden ausschließlich mit etablierten, internationalen
Dienstleistern, wie DHL, DPD oder UPS. 
Müsst ihr meine Pakete kontrollieren? 
Um die Ausfuhr beim Zollamt anzumelden müssen wir gegebenenfalls in dein
Paket schauen. Den Inhalt von Briefen lassen wir jedoch unangetastet. 
Wie verwalte ich meine Briefe und Pakete? 
Das Onlinemanagement ist der Schlüssel. Unser Login-Bereich macht es dir
möglich unsere vielen verschiedenen Services zu buchen und deine Sendungen
einfach zu verwalten. Durch dieses elektronische System können wir dir im
Vergleich zu Logistikfirmen gute und günstige Preise bieten. 
Seid ihr ein zugelassener Postdienst?  
Wir haben bereits eine Postlizenz und dürfen damit deine Post und Pakete
offiziell befördern.  
Wie kann ich Mailbox Germany als zweiten Briefkasten nutzen?

Du kannst über den Nachsendeservice der deutschen Post deinen Briefkasten
praktisch zu uns umziehen lassen.

Vielen Dank für deine Aufmerksamkeit und deine Unterstützung, sei ganz am Anfang dieser Idee dabei und hilf uns Produkte, Geschenke und Post in alle Welt zu senden.Euer Mailbox-Germany-TeamEnglish version

Our
idea 

Many
people abroad like to order goods from Germany and actually can do
that. But most of the traders deliver only domestically. The same
thing is experienced by lot of Germans, who are permanently located
abroad, for example, expatriates, pensioners or soldiers. Moreover,
they can not automatically collect their mail. 

Our
idea is to overcome this obstacle quite easy: each of our customers
gets some storage place and a
German
delivery address,
where they can send packages,
letters and magazines
at the domestic rates. Everyone can check their account, see when the
package has been received here and choose whether to forward it
directly to his home or to combine several shipments into a bigger
one. Then, the desired goods or mails are only one step away. 


  But
there are even more possibilities: we can also scan the mail and
provide it online with no time delays. This is perfect for people,
who move between different locations due to their work or traveling.
Flexible and diversified tariff options allow everyone to customize
the mailbox for his individual needs. 

In
order to be ready to go, we still need your
help.What is
special about this idea?Customers
from abroad can buy at German online retailers that do not offer international
shipping (e.g. Otto, Tchibo or SportScheck)Price advantages
through low shipping costs and legal safeguard for customers and retailers are
ensured since German country-specific legal requirements apply A
German shipping address for packages, letters and magazines including the
following services:
Temporary storage and consolidation- Put several
orders into one package and save money!
Reception and forwarding abroad. We send you your
package to any country!
Digitization of printed matter- digitalize your mail for easier
management!

Transparency
of cost and performance- easy tariff overview
Simple and
quick calculation ofshipping prices calculated via our shipping calculator
Online item
check by reference to automatic generated pictures at receipt of goods
Manage all
services directly from our online platform
Our services at a glance:
Reception and
storage of packages, letters and magazines/newspapers
Forwarding of packages
(separately or consolidated)
(Automatic)
forwarding of letters (separately or consolidated)

(Automatic) digitization
of letters, documents and other printed material

We also forward
official correspondence to you
In addition we
offer:
Return service (in case your purchased items do not meet  your expectations)
Online management of your packages and documents
Complete your customs declaration online
Several tariff options (Free, Private, Professional)
A multilingual website (German, English, French)
Individual delivery address (leaving out the designation Mailbox Germany)
individuelle Adressstruktur ohne unseren Firmennamen
Shipping within Germany
Sustainability Philosophy- packaging is biodegradable and optional carbon neutral shipping available
Use locational advantagesOur company is located in Merseburg (Saxony-Anhalt), very close to the DHL World
Cargo Center in Leipzig as well as to other depot locations (UPS, TNT, DPD, Hermes,
GLS) in Central Germany.  You still have questions?In
our FAQ section
you find a comprehensive summary of questions and answers to the following
subjects:Customs and regulations, faulty deliveries, returns, etc.To
find out more about our services go to Prices and Services.
Cross-border shopping - Three example, how we came up with our idea
Mailbox Germany
takes Mini Cooper to BWM-MuseumWhat exactly do you do when your car breaks down in a foreign country?
Exactly this happened to my friend Paul in Brazil. On his journey throughout
South America he had his Mini Cooper designed by street artists. After about
12.000 miles his clutch broke.At the dealership he was told that repair costs would amount to $2.000
and that the delivery period would be uncertain. Paul would not let himself get
into this. But leaving his car behind was out of the question. Fortunately,
help was at hand. By searching the internet, he found a clutch for €185 on a website of a German online shop. But the
trader was not willing to deliver outside Germany. That is when Paul called us
to ask if we could take delivery of his clutch and send it to Brazil.Absolutely! Thanks to our online shop Vireo.de we have aquired practical knowledge concerning international shipping.
 Paul was able to save a great amount of money and time. And the Mini- 
is today an object of art and part of the permanent exhibition in the 
BMW Museum in Munich. This is one of the events that brought up the 
startup idea of delivery forwarding. How shipping across borders
can save lives All around the world product scandals shatter consumer trust again and
again. People concerned often wish having the choice of an
alternative supplier. In 2008 people in China were terrified by the news and
events of prohibited chemicals that were found in powdered milk.  Six
babies died and at least 300.000 small children with kidney stones had to be
treated in hospitals. Ever since, many Chinese stock up on German powdered milk among other
things. Exchange students and tourists supply their family and friends back home.
But those who do not have relatives or friends in Europe would also like to buy
in Germany. However, manufacturers react with shipping regulations. 
With Mailbox Germany we intend to set up a service that offers people residing
outside Germany the opportunity to buy and order products as if they were
living here. Today, people are searching globally for products that their domestic
market does not provide.
In business it often happens that one would like to
take more baggage along than actually authorized by the airlines. Consequently,
the rest is being shipped in a package to its destination. 

Is it really that easy? 
The devil is in the detail: Should one really ship goods without prior
inspection to the customer? Will the hotel accept the delivery properly? When
does the package have to be delivered in order to arrive in time? Do I immediately
have to enter into negotiations with haulage companies for a simple shipment? 
There was a businessman who expressed the wish that there was a company
that could stock his delivery for a few days until he gets to the hotel to receive
the goods personally.Great! That was our first thought since with Mailbox Germany we provide a
forwarding service thanks to which we will receive packages and letters in
Germany and send them across the globe. When and where you want your items to
be shipped lies exclusively in your hands. Our customers can control all
processes easily and transparently online. We deal with the customs declaration
and find the best transport tariff for you. On our website customers can log
into their user account to request shipping of their goods and will be
informed about delivery charges and delivery time. Using the tracking tool on
our website you can check on the delivery status of your items at any time.Swiss people purchase iPhone 5 before release dateNo delivery date for the iPhone 5 in Switzerland! This issue experienced a lot of swiss Apple fans.The answer was very simple - order the iPhone 5S and 5C simply online in Germany!Click here for this interesting article: iPhone 5S and 5C: How Swiss buy iphone in advance.With an address in Germany your order is done quickly and easily enough  - Mailbox Germany makes it possible! Our perksThank You Email - 5€We thank you for your support with a personal Email. Thank You Picture - 10€ Thank You team picture just for you!Individual Postcard - 15€We will send you a Thank You, very classic with a individual postcard including a beautiful picture of Merseburg - worldwide!Light it up - 15€You'll get this useful solar-flashlight. The perfect companion for traveling and or for your car. You can charge the lamp through the built in Dynamo or the solar panel.So you're never dependent from batteries! For international orders pls add 5€ extra for shipping costs.A little present for you - 19€We will send you for free a little Thank-you gift out of our shop www.vireo.de

For international orders pls add 5€ extra for shipping costs.Wall of Fame - 29€Your name will get a spot on our Wall of Fame. As a proof we will send you a picture of this!Small Mailbox Package - 39€You get one year our subscription "Private" for free plus 10€ on your first forwarded shipment.Sunshine Package - 59€(similar to figure)you think our Idea is great, but you dont need it yourself? But 
maybe a small, flexible and environmentally friendly solar panel (USB, 
3W with battery), with which you can charge mobile devices (camera, 
mobile) on the go.
International shipping: +8€Mailbox Package - 75€You will get our subscription "Professional" plus a Postcard from Merseburg / Germany.  Meet and Greet - 99€We will guide you and two friends of your choice through our 
company. Afterwards you get a small snack and we play a foosball 
tournament together. In addition, we have a little surprise for you. Big Sunshine Package - 135€You want to do more for the environment than to forward your 
packages carbon neutral? Then charge your devices with a large, flexible
 solar panel (USB, 12W) worth over 150 € from our mail order store 
Vireo.de.Professional Mailbox Package - 250€You'll get our subscription Professional for one year for free and
 a credit on out service fees worth 100€. Additionally you will get a 
surprise package with typical german Products.The Special One - 500€We invite you (+1) for 2 days to Merseburg. You live in a 
beautiful mansion near the Merseburg Castle (location of The Monuments 
Men). In addition, we invite you to a seasonal cultural event and a 
guided tour through our company.FAQWhy
do they not send my packages directly abroad?
50%
of online shops in Germany do not actively send abroad, therefore it
may happen that you do not get important goods. Which
area does Mailbox Germany operate in? Germany
acts in the Small Parcel Area up to 40kg. For shipments bigger than
that other international logistics companies and freight forwarders
are better suited. Do
you ship the goods by yourself? No,
we ship only with established, international service providers, such
as DHL, DPD or UPS. Are
you going to check my package? If
it will be necessary,  we will check the content of the package
in order to have it registered at the custom office. However, the
letters are not going to be controlled. How
can I manage my mail and packages? The
online management is the key. Through an online account it is
possible to select from a range of our services and easily manage
your shipments. So we can offer you the friendly prices in comparison
to services of logistic companies. Are
you a licensed postal service? Yes,
we
have a postal licence. Therefore, we can officially carry your mail
and packages. How
can I use Mailbox Germany as my second mailbox? You
can redirect your mailings to our address using the redirection
service of Deutsche Post.

story:
Hi, Maybe the title has intrigued you a bit?

Have you heard of leishmania, lepra, chagas disease, cholera, rickettsiosis, schistosomiasis…

well,

let me make it straightforward here,

In many countries these diseases became a history but in a little region in Guatemala called Pojom things are different!

WHAT?

A blonde talking about diseases in Guatemala, using crowdfunding?

YES,  let me explain

I’m Victoria a medical doctor specialized in infectious diseases & tropical medicine (http://www.itg.be/modirisk/GeneralSite/Default.aspx?L=E&WPID=513) ,  

worked

{Yes I’m from Russia if that what you’re thinking}

Medicine always was my greatest passion. I can't imagine myself in any other field. I love people and I strongly think that I can change this world by helping them.

Since my graduation (http://www.bashgmu.ru)  I worked in emergency room in a state hospital for infectious diseases ( http://ikb4.ru )  in Ufa - my home city in Russia. I participated in several medical projects in many countries such as Egypt, Indonesia and Cambodia.

And you know… Seeing the smile on the faces of those kids and their families after they get cured, since then this road has captured me and made it clear what I want to do next

Guatemala, more specifically Pojom (http://itouchmap.com/?c=gt&UF=-1134874&UN=-1681374&DG=FRM ) as I have clear objective, which is : going there to work voluntarily for a year in a medical center that provides healthcare for over 20 villages ( http://www.vivirenamor.be/home.aspx ), I will be the only doctor treating them from infectious diseases that you no longer hear about in your city or country or even your whole continent, like europe for example.

I will share with other volunteers a small place with no electricity, no hot water, no telecommunications as we have here and the nearest hospital is 7 hours away by car on a bumpy road!

Well, if you are wondering why a girl like me want to go through all that? It’s simple, I believe in helping those people and it’s my mission to do so.

Now, comes your part in this long, hard, and unfurtunately expensive trip.

http://www.expedia.be/Flights-Search?trip=roundtrip&leg1=from:UFA,to:GUA,departure:01/05/2014TANYT&leg2=from:GUA,to:UFA,departure:06/02/2015TANYT&passengers=children:0,adults:1,seniors:0,infantinlap:Y&options=cabinclass:coach&mode=search&

The ticket become even more expensive  becouse without a visa I cant cross USA- so I have to go indirectly.

I need your support to get there by plane, please, make a difference in the lives of those people.

Even if you can’t donate now, at least share this video, help me tell my story so we can help these people together!

All funds in excess of the amount will be given to the needs of the clinic.

Thank you!

You can contact me:
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/viktoriya.miller.3
vkontacte: http://vk.com/id2715332
livejournal: http://tropical-doc.livejournal.com
e-mail: viktoriya.valikova@gmail.com

Блондинка едет в Гватемалу!

Привет, наверняка заголовок вас заинтриговал?

Вы когда-нибудь слышали о лейшманиозе, холере, лепре, болезни Шагаса, риккетциозах, шистосомиазе?

Ну что ж,

Давайте разберемся:

Во многих странах эти болезни уже сто лет как забыты, но в маленьком регионе Гватемалы, что зовется Поджом, все не так радужно.

Что за бред???

Блондинка рассуждает о болезнях в Гватемале на crowdfunding?

Да уж. Я, пожалуй, лучше объясню:

Меня зовут Виктория, и я - врач специализирующийся на инфекциях и тропической медицине, работала...

(И да, я из России, если вы уже наверно поняли)

после того как я получила диплом врача я работала в приемном покое в инфекционной больнице города Уфы, участвовала в нескольких врачебных проектах в Египте, Индонезии и Камбодже.

И… если бы вы видели улыбки этих детей и их счастливых родителей когда ребятишки снова здоровы… С этого самого момента я поняла что помогать самым бедным и нуждающимся – это мой путь и теперь я точно знаю чему я хочу посвятить свою жизнь.

Я начну в Гватемале, конкретно в Поджоме: я еду туда и работать волонтером в маленьком медицинском госпитале, куда приходят за помощью жители 20 окрестных деревень. Я буду там единственным врачом, лечащим их от заболеваний, о которых вы никогда не слышали(и никогда не услышите!) в вашем городе, стране или даже континенте (например, в европе).

Я буду жить с другими волонтерами (медсестрой и акушеркой) в скромном кэмпе при больнице: без электричества, горячей воды, телекоммуникаций которые есть у нас тут… и до ближайшей больницы - 7 часов езды по разбитой дороге.

Наверно вы задаетесь вопросом- что потеряла эта девушка в глуши и почему она хочет пройти через все это? Все просто, ребята. Я верю, что я могу помочь и я просто не могу поступить иначе.

Теперь настал ваш черед в этой долгой, тяжелой и, к сожалению, очень дорогой миссии.

Мне очень нужна ваша поддержка чтобы добраться в Гватемалы: у меня нет в средств чтобы оплатить билет. Пожалуйста, помогите мне начать делать мою работу-  спасать людей.

*Билет становится еще дороже из-за того что граждане РФ не могут пересекать границу США или Канады без визы- даже транзитом. Поэтому мне придется лететь в окружную- что очень дорого. *

Если вы не можете сделать пожертвование сейчас- поделитесь этим видео и я уверена- мы сможем сделать этот мир лучше вместе!

Спасибо!

лет как забыты, но в маленьком регионе Гватемалы, что зовется Поджом, все не
так радужно.
Что за бред???
Блондинка рассуждает о болезнях в
Гватемале на crowdfunding?
Да уж. Я, пожалуй, лучше объясню:
Меня зовут Виктория, и я - врач
специализирующийся на инфекциях и тропической медицине, работала...

(И да, я из России, если вы уже наверно
поняли)
после того как я получила диплом врача я
работала в приемном покое в инфекционной больнице города Уфы, участвовала в
нескольких врачебных проектах в Египте, Индонезии и Камбодже.
И… если бы вы видели улыбки этих детей и
их счастливых родителей когда ребятишки снова здоровы… С этого самого момента я
поняла что помогать самым бедным и нуждающимся – это мой путь и теперь я точно
знаю чему я хочу посвятить свою жизнь.
Я начну в Гватемале, конкретно в
Поджоме: я еду туда и работать волонтером в маленьком медицинском госпитале,
куда приходят за помощью жители 20 окрестных деревень. Я буду там единственным
врачом, лечащим их от заболеваний, о которых вы никогда не слышали(и никогда не
услышите!) в вашем городе, стране или даже континенте (например, в европе).
Я буду жить с другими волонтерами
(медсестрой и акушеркой) в скромном кэмпе
при больнице: без электричества, горячей воды, телекоммуникаций которые есть у
нас тут… и до ближайшей больницы - 7 часов езды по разбитой дороге.
Наверно вы задаетесь вопросом- что
потеряла эта девушка в глуши и почему она хочет пройти через все это? Все
просто, ребята. Я верю, что я могу помочь и я просто не могу поступить иначе.
Теперь настал ваш черед в этой
долгой, тяжелой и, к сожалению, очень дорогой миссии.
Мне очень нужна ваша поддержка
чтобы добраться в Гватемалы: у меня нет в средств чтобы оплатить билет. Пожалуйста,
помогите мне начать делать мою работу- 
спасать людей.
*Билет становится еще дороже из-за
того что граждане РФ не могут пересекать границу США или Канады без визы- даже
транзитом. Поэтому мне придется лететь в окружную- что очень дорого. *
Если вы не можете сделать
пожертвование сейчас- поделитесь этим видео и я уверена- мы сможем сделать этот
мир лучше вместе!
Спасибо!

story:
Aloha
ACCESS Capabilities recently opened a supported sober living house on the east side of the Big Island. Unfortunately due to issues surrounding the changing face of the health insurance industry we have not recouped our investment as quickly as we had hoped and were not able to implement all the plans we initially had. One of those plans was to teach food self sufficiency to the boarders at our homes. 

While this would be a minimal initial investment we can not find the means to engage these plans at this time and are seeking help from our island community and beyond the islands. This would not only benefit the program in the short run, but be a viable and ongoing source of nutrition, education, and income and training opportunities for the boarders at our homes in Keaau. 
An extremely brief history of Hawaii's agriculture:
Prior to the overthrow of the Hawaiian Kingdom the islands of Hawaii were an agricultural marvel. From the mountains to the sea nearly every patch of land was cultivated to produce something of value and use to the Kanka 'Oiwi, the native people of these islands. When the California Gold Rush started and the states of Washington and Oregon were being founded a huge percentage of the food that sustained these movements were sourced from the island kingdom. Unfortuantely, through the deprivation of disease and a flawed attempt to grant land ownership the land transferred from the hands of the Native population to a few land owners who held vast tracks of land that they used to produce sugar. Without access to land and water rights the people of Hawaii were unable to sustain themselves in the ways that they had done for centuries. Thus began an era that has lasted to the modern day in which over 90% of all the food consumed in Hawaii is shipped in by either air or barge from the mainland US or other countries. 
Hawaii still has the ability to produce massive amounts of produce, yet most of the land is unused. In ancient times on the windward side of the islands large and complicated irrigation systems for taro were constructed called lois, which could produce massive amounts of food from both the taro plant and the fish that lived in the water. While ACCESS does not have the land necessary to create loi we can simulate a substitute that will be as functional using modern materials.
Aquaponics:
Aquaponics, based primarily on practices employed by ancient Aztec civilizations is a system amazingly similar to the ancient Kanaka food production systems. With minimal materials and training we could instruct our boarders to grow many staple foods (i.e., Taro, potatoes, sweet potatoes, kale, lettuce, celery, chives, strawberries, corn, cucumbers, etc.) many of which are not often found in traditional aquaponic systems but can be easily managed through the use of specialized containers. This food could not only help feed our population, but could also be a source of barter and income at local farmer's markets. The system would also create a steady source of protein in the form of tilapia. 
The system we are proposing would be fairly large, containing up to 100 lbs of fish and having 100 square feet of growing space. It could potentially provide for all the green needs of the boarders of the Keaau houses. 

What We Need & What You Get

ACCESS would not only like to teach our residents how to lead clean and sober lives, but to also be more self sufficient overall. To this end we would like to show them how to create, maintain, and thrive an aquaponic system. Kanaka 'Oiwi (Native Hawaiians) used aquaponic systems for almost two thousand years prior to Western contact in the form of Loi, or taro patches. With this form of massive food production they were able to support an extreme population, some estimates put it over one million people prior to contact with Western disease. The aquaponic system we propose is simple in design, maintenance, and use. The materials are readily available, if not somewhat expensive.
The systems we would like to build would be somewhat portable and easily replicated. Using food safe water barrels and troughs lined with food safe liner we would create an ebb and flow system in the ample yard space of the grounds of the current residential house in Keaau. With this expandable system we would be able to grow lettuce, chard, spinach, basil, and other green leafy vegetables in both the cinder beds and on floating platforms. Two large tanks would both grow and breed tilapia fish for consumption as well. Using other specially designed pots we could also grow sweet potato, corn, broccoli, cauliflower, cucumbers, tomatoes, and other staple crops.

The Impact

The idea would be to supplement the food stores of the house, teach the residents to grow, harvest, can and sell/trade their crop, as well as to create and maintain the system. Additionally we would be able to offer our residents fresh healthy vegetables that did not use any pesticides, herbicides, or non-organic fertilizers.
The investment we would receive for this project would go to pay for the materials for the system, the initial design and building of the system, maintenance, seeds and fish, fish food, and canning materials.

Costs and Materials

The initial cost of a simple system are minimal. This project would be a more advanced system. There are several materials that are necessary for such a system and part of the set up costs:

  1. Lumber
  2. Food grade liner
  3. Plumbing Fixtures and piping
  4. Electric water pumps, electrical wiring, conduit, outlets and outlet receptacles
  5. Timers
  6. Materials for floating beds
  7. Specialized pots and seed beds
  8. Cinder, potting soil, and other growing strata
  9. Paint and painting supplies
  10. Screws, nails and other fastners
There are also some specialty skills that we will have to hire out for to make a top of the line system:

  1. Plumber
  2. Electrician
Once the system is fully operational there will be the final costs of populating the system with fish, earthworms, and the cost of seeds and other cuttings. Finally there will be some costs associated with maintance, such as fish food, and training. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can not help financially that is okay, there are other ways that you can help:

    • Please kokua and get the word out and use the coconut wireless and other social media to tell people about our project.
    • If nothing else use Indiegogo share tools and post this to your Facebook or Twitter accounts

    While the initial investment would be difficult for our organization to shoulder alone, with everyone pitching in what they can we can easily meet our goal.
    Please help these individuals not only get the healthy and nutritious food that they need, but also learn skills that they would be able to use to provide for themselves and their families for years to come.
    Mahalo Nui Loa

story:
Traditional Medicine for Sustainable Health

Thanks for visiting our campaign!  We are Chloe and Becky, two passionate licensed practitioners of Chinese Medicine.  Herbs are the foundation of Chinese medicine, a practice that has been developed and refined over thousands of years, allowing patients to be treated in a holistic manner with little to no side effects.  Some common conditions that we work with are insomnia, depression, digestive disturbances, menopause, and infertility.  While we are amazed at the capability of our medicine, we are disheartened by the shortcomings of its reach.   It is estimated that less than 5% of the American population utilizes Chinese medicine and our goal is to make it more affordable and accessible for those in our community. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for help raising the final funds to start our clinic.  The money raised will go towards purchasing herbal inventory, marketing efforts, and securing our storefront.

  • We need $6,000
  • For your contribution, we want to give back by showing you how well this medicine works with a free herbal consult for a $50 donation.
  • If $50 is not in your budget, we would love to share with you some herbal teas that can help with digestion, relaxation, and immunity.

The Impact

Our mission at Urban Herbs is to provide accessible and affordable Chinese medicine to one of the best communities Colorado has to offer.  We strive to provide a beacon of health to the low-income population, a source of quality herbs to the Oriental Medicine network in Denver, and the first small step in the breadth of this medicine nationwide.  We are asking for your help to spread our efforts and get this business off the ground.

Five Points is a community in Denver that does not have enough support.  This community is largely low-income and are on 200% more pharmaceuticals than average.  The Welton St. corridor is plagued by vacancy, where at one point it was the home of mayors, filled with rich traditions and the musical soundings of Duke Ellington, it is now struggling to keep crime rates down and increase education.

Urban Herbs aims to provide the simple service of using Chinese herbs to keep this community healthy so it can thrive once again. 

Diabetes, obesity, and physical pain are among the many ailments that Chinese medicine can help.  Herbs have been used for over 4,000 years and can act preventatively by boosting the immune system, increasing energy, and thwarting viruses.  Herbal formulas can be customized for each individual based on his or her constitution and presenting symptoms. 

In this way, each patient receives quality care specific to his or her needs.  Herbs can aid in sleep, digestion, and emotional disturbances.  This small and very affordable investment can have a tremendous impact on a patient’s overall health.

Your contribution is helping our patients in big ways- through accessibility, affordability, and expansion; and in small, meaningful ways- through compassion, community, and personal connections. 

Thank you for your unending confidence in us.  We are beyond lucky to share the company of such inspirational people as yourselves!
